Name: Contracts, Not-for-Profit, Review
Title: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to the review of patterns of contractual spending by the city agencies with not-for-profit organizations.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Contracts
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Section 30 of the charter of the city of New York is amended by adding a new subdivision 3 to read as follows and renumbering subdivisions 3, 4 and 5 respectfully:
3.	patterns of contractual spending by city agencies with not-for-profit organizations and patterns of spending by not-for-profit organizations that receive city funding comprising one hundred thousand dollars or more of the budget of such organization; 
Â§2.  This local law shall become effective immediately.



SD
Int212/2004
